ygData.subject: The Battle Rages On
ygData.msgSnippet: (Response to Iron Raptor s Repairs post is in this e-mail) Oblitertron (gestalt)/Dark Wolf (gestalt)/Defensor (gestalt)/Sixshot/Double Punch/

Subject: The Battle Rages On
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

(Response to Iron Raptor's "Repairs" post is in this e-mail)

Oblitertron (gestalt)/Dark Wolf (gestalt)/Defensor (gestalt)/Sixshot/Double 
Punch/
Injecotr/Manterror/Bumblebee/Beeline/Ares/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Firestarter/Unitron/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Chordate:




Oblitertron looked at Defensor with disgust and raised his rifle, launching 
off three bolts from the weapon of war.  He got up as Defensor staggered back 
from the force of the blast.

---

The Maximal gestalt watched as Oblitertron ran forward as fast as he could, 
shoulder pointed in Defensor's direction.  Defensor bent down and prepared to 
uppercut, but  realized he'd been tricked by the enemy gestalt when 
Oblitertron fired off a single charged optic blast, stabbing into his left 
shoulder and knocking him back, almost stumbling to the ground.

Defensor raised his arms as Oblitertron raised his rifle and wrapped his 
black finger around the trigger and began to pull it back.

---

Dark Wolf charged another ball of blue sizzling energy, and tossed it at Sky 
Lynx.  If Oblitertron fell, Dark Wolf would be on top of Defensor quickly.  
If Defensor fell though, Dark Wolf would stil be on top of him quickly.

---

Ares watched the four missiles go towards Sixshot, and fired off three 
precise bolts from his rifle at the missiles and wathced the three explosions.

---

Sixshot felt pain as a missile struck into his already dented and burned 
armor.  This form wasn't maneuverable for the kind of battle going on 
currently.  He swerved his dual batteries, chargin them, and firing two 
blasts from the two cannons in each battery.
As the eight blasts from the laser cannons lanced out at Sky Lynx, Sixshot 
transformed into his biped mode, a hypersonic concussion blaster in each hand 
and charging up.

---

Double Punch did a back flip as Beeline, his cyberbee, dove, firing off four 
optic blasts, intercepting the three missiles incoming at its master and a 
charge heading for Bumblebee.  It pulled up, its little engines barely able 
to handle the fast-paced maneuvers it was executing.

Double Punch felt a few shots out of the numerous fired strike his back as he 
did the flip and he stumbled, raising a pincher and launching off two energy 
signature seeking missiles at Sideswipe.  He moved his right pincher, firing 
off a single missile of the same type at Torca.

---

Injector raised the side of him with the stinger up and pulled upward hard, a 
dozen of the shots striking him in his armored thorax, sending him spinning.  
He regained control, though upside down, and lowered the part of him with the 
stinger, and fired off two stinger missiles at Ratchet, a little 
disorientated from the quick maneuver.

---

Manterror was struck in the abdomen by the tusk missile, letting out a loud 
grunt of pain.  He raised an arm, firing off four ion disks at Ratchet's left 
knee.

---

Bumblebee watched as the charge exploded several meters in front of him 
before it could explode against its intended target.  He shrugged, not 
knowing where it came from but he wasn't unhappy about it.  He raised both 
arms, the hands at the ends of the mechanical arms holding a stinger missile 
launcher.  From each stinger missile launcher went out two stinger missiles, 
four in all heading for Torca's chestplate.

---

Sun Crusher yelled out as the charge struck him in the chest head on and 
knocked him to his back.  He moaned, slowly getting up.

---

Reflector heard Sun Crusher's yell and raised his rifle, firing off four 
bolts at Torca in retaliation for his comrade's pain.

---

Nemesis Enforcer watched the unsuspecting Iron Raptor, keeping his face that 
of anger instead of the smile that wanted to form on his metallic lips.  He 
watched the explosion, and her hit the ground.

He raised his rifle, the barrel pointing downward at Iron Raptor's already 
damaged torso.  He raised an arm and pointed down at Iron Raptor, trying to 
signal Scattershot to kill her.  The high ranking Alliance member doubted 
Defensor would attack him, but he didn't want to take any chances.  But, when 
watching Iron Raptor squirm, he laughed.

He fired off five rapid laser blasts from his rifle at Iron Raptor's torso, 
the shots just being pot shots.

---

Scattershot threw his head back harder and burst out in an even more sadistic 
laugh.
"What's that, Unicron?  Finish her and bring her spark to you?  Well...if you 
insist..." he smiled, ignoring Iron Raptor's signs of pain.  He was a little 
interested as to why she wasn't returning fire.  Scattershot decided she was 
just in too much pain.  Best to keep her in that state.  He raised his own 
rifle, firing off twelve rounds of armor-piercing shells at Iron Raptor's 
right shoulder.  

"Best to pick a spot and keep shooting." he laughed, whistling at 
Oblitertron's comeback on Defensor.  "That's going to be fun to intervene in 
when Mega-Witch is deceased and dead.  Doesn't she have a boyfriend?" he 
asked himself, initiating scans for Prowl's location. 

"Aha!" he yelled.  He'd found Prowl.  He would keep his internal sensors on 
Prowl so he could track him.  When Iron Raptor was dead, he'd kill Prowl 
next.  Of course, Prowl could be one of his big hero types and might try and 
save Iron Raptor.  So if Prowl headed in their direction, he'd know.  

---

Unitron fired off two more missiles, each striking the main entry way of the 
Cybertronian Fire.  "This is rather irritating.  Maybe we should go for one 
of the small access hatches in the side, Firestarter.  Maybe one closer to 
the bridge."

---

The other robot thought for a second at Unitron's words.  "Hmmm..."  He 
looked at the side of the CF they were facing and made his decision.  He 
raised both arms, firing off a missile from each compartment in the bottom of 
his forearms, both missiles striking the dmaaged entry way, but it didn't 
blow open.

"This side is undefended by missile launchers.  No one in interfering with us 
as of yet.  Moving would make us have to deal with a missile launcher and 
possibly Maximals.  Here is fine for now."

He looked to Unitron, and got his answer when two dozen rapid bolts of laser 
energy flew from the robot's nosecone and struck the entry way of the 
Cybertronian Fire.  

=

Chordate yelled out as he felt the base shake from the numerous missiles 
striking the Cybertronian Fire's hull.  "Hull integrity is lowered down to 
81%." he said to himself.  "The entry way those people are working down is at 
a 70% integrity."

He activated his comm. unit.  "Kluster?  What is your response?  Yes or no?  
You have to decide now." He brought up a visual on the two bots attacking the 
entry way.  One was in a space fighter mode, the other hovering in a biped 
mode.  He'd never seen either of them before.  Of course, he hadn't seen over 
two-thirds of the enemies of the Maximals, so that fact didn't really matter. 
 He turned in his chair to look at Hysteria better.

The hyena bot was rather small.  She didn't look that strong, rather puny in 
Chordate's opinion.  -No, she can't take those two on- he said, turning back 
to face the screens.  His hands flashed like lightning over the secondary 
control system, the main one destroyed.
He had the autoguns go online, but stay in the ceiling, and the flame 
throwers in the side of the walls power up throughout the Maxi warship.  He 
doubted the internal defenses would stop most of the robots his Maximal 
comrades were facing though.
